entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind south 30 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of light snow. High minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind south 20 km/h becoming west 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 13 March 2023
